    Welcome to the Splice Machine Database Service!

    Welcome to Splice Machine, the database platform for adaptive applications that manage operational processes. This site contains documentation for our Managed Database Service in the Cloud.

    Splice Machine is a hybrid relational database platform that allows you to run transactional (OLTP) and analytical (OLAP) SQL workloads, concurrently, against shared data. To ensure that one does not interfere with the other, Splice Machine uses resource isolation and a ground-breaking MVCC technology for concurrent, non-locking, distributed ACID transactions.

    With Splice Machine, you can manage operational processes, large-scale IoT infrastructures, and use analytical processing and machine learning to improve over time.

    Splice Machine delivers an open-source data platform that incorporates the proven scalability of HBase™ and the in-memory performance of Apache Spark™. The cost-based optimizer uses advanced statistics to choose the best compute engine, storage engine, index access, join order and join algorithm for each task. In this way, Splice Machine can concurrently process transactional and analytical workloads at scale.

    Version Information

    This site contains the documentation for:

    Version 2.6 of Splice Machine, released July, 2017

    If you're using an earlier version, you'll find the documentation here:

    Version 2.5 Release 2.5 Documentation (Feb 2017)
    Version 2.0 Release 2.0 Documentation (Sep. 2016)
    Version 1.5 Release 1.5 Documentation (Jun. 2016)

    Main Sections in the Documentation

    The Splice Machine Documentation is divided into three main areas, each of which contains multiple sections, as shown in the following table. The Splice Machine topics apply to all products, and the DB-Service Only topics are specific to this product.

    Menu Section Description
    Splice Machine Welcome Introduction to our main documentation, which contains the main sections that apply to all Splice Machine products.
    Tutorials A collection of tutorials that walk you through numerous specific tasks to help you quickly learn how to use your Splice Machine database more productively.
    SQL Reference Manual The reference manual for the Splice Machine implementation of SQL.
    Developer's Manual Topics of interest to all developers working with Splice Machine.
    Database Console Guide An introduction to the Splice Machine Spark Database Console.
    Release Notes Release and update notes for Splice Machine products.
    Other Notes A loose collection of useful topics, including our glossary and how to use this documentation.
    DB-Service Only Welcome Introduction to our documentation sections that apply only to our cloud-managed database service product.
    Cloud Manager Guide A guide to our Cloud Manager, which is the Dashboard from which you create, manage, and use your clusters.
    Using Zeppelin A guide to using Zeppelin notebooks to work with your Splice Machine databases.
    Release Notes Release notes for our Database-as-Service product.
    On-Premise-DB Only Welcome Introduction to our documentation sections that apply only to our on-premise database product.
    Installation Step-by-step instructions for installing the on-premise version of Splice Machine on compatible platforms.
    splice> Command Line Reference The reference manual for our on-premise Splice Machine command line interface.
    Administrator's Guide Topics that describe the administrative tasks associated with configuring and maintaining your on-premise Splice Machine database.
    Release Notes Release notes for our On-Premise-Db product.

    Using our Documentation

    Please visit our Documentation Summary page for a quick introduction to navigating and using the components of our documentation system.
